Text: Thank You frnd.The Marnie print was a bit grainy but apart from that most of ur releases are good in quality

@varuneric::

I keep the original quality [if it's possible] for both video and audio [so...no filters...no number of channels modified....maybe a little volume gain !!]

If the source is  "a bit grainy" then the rip it is also ..."a bit grainy". 

P.S. To apply some de-graining filters requires alot more computing power for H264 720p ..... which I don't have !! 

Cheers.
